text: The 1934 Volta a Catalunya was the 16th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 16 June to 24 June 1934. The race started and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Bernardo Rogora. == Route and stages == {| class="wikitable" |+List of stages |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Course ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- !
